name: Valuation.RankOne.strictMono'
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
self : v.RankOne
⊢ StrictMono ⇑(Valuation.RankOne.hom v)
decl:
/-- A valuation has rank one if it is nontrivial and its image is contained in `ℝ≥0`.
  Note that this class includes the data of an inclusion morphism `Γ₀ → ℝ≥0`. -/
class RankOne (v : Valuation R Γ₀) where
  /-- The inclusion morphism from `Γ₀` to `ℝ≥0`. -/
  hom : Γ₀ →*₀ ℝ≥0
  strictMono' : StrictMono hom
  nontrivial' : ∃ r : R, v r ≠ 0 ∧ v r ≠ 1

name: Valuation.RankOne.nontrivial'
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
self : v.RankOne
⊢ Exists fun r => And (Ne (v r) 0) (Ne (v r) 1)
decl:
/-- A valuation has rank one if it is nontrivial and its image is contained in `ℝ≥0`.
  Note that this class includes the data of an inclusion morphism `Γ₀ → ℝ≥0`. -/
class RankOne (v : Valuation R Γ₀) where
  /-- The inclusion morphism from `Γ₀` to `ℝ≥0`. -/
  hom : Γ₀ →*₀ ℝ≥0
  strictMono' : StrictMono hom
  nontrivial' : ∃ r : R, v r ≠ 0 ∧ v r ≠ 1

name: Valuation.RankOne.strictMono
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
inst✝ : v.RankOne
⊢ StrictMono ⇑(Valuation.RankOne.hom v)

name: Valuation.RankOne.nontrivial
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
inst✝ : v.RankOne
⊢ Exists fun r => And (Ne (v r) 0) (Ne (v r) 1)
decl: lemma nontrivial : ∃ r : R, v r ≠ 0 ∧ v r ≠ 1 := nontrivial'

name: Valuation.RankOne.zero_of_hom_zero
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
inst✝ : v.RankOne
x : Γ₀
hx : Eq ((Valuation.RankOne.hom v) x) 0
⊢ Eq x 0
decl:
/-- If `v` is a rank one valuation and `x : Γ₀` has image `0` under `RankOne.hom v`, then
  `x = 0`. -/
theorem zero_of_hom_zero {x : Γ₀} (hx : hom v x = 0) : x = 0 := by
  refine (eq_of_le_of_not_lt (zero_le' (a := x)) fun h_lt ↦ ?_).symm
  have hs := strictMono v h_lt
  rw [_root_.map_zero, hx] at hs
  exact hs.false

name: Valuation.RankOne.hom_eq_zero_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
inst✝ : v.RankOne
x : Γ₀
⊢ Iff (Eq ((Valuation.RankOne.hom v) x) 0) (Eq x 0)
decl:
/-- If `v` is a rank one valuation, then`x : Γ₀` has image `0` under `RankOne.hom v` if and
  only if `x = 0`. -/
theorem hom_eq_zero_iff {x : Γ₀} : RankOne.hom v x = 0 ↔ x = 0 :=
  ⟨fun h ↦ zero_of_hom_zero v h, fun h ↦ by rw [h, _root_.map_zero]⟩

name: Valuation.RankOne.unit_ne_one
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : Ring R
Γ₀ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ₀
v : Valuation R Γ₀
inst✝ : v.RankOne
⊢ Ne (Valuation.RankOne.unit v) 1
decl:
/-- A proof that `RankOne.unit v ≠ 1`. -/
theorem unit_ne_one : unit v ≠ 1 := by
  rw [Ne, ← Units.eq_iff, Units.val_one]
  exact ((nontrivial v).choose_spec ).2
